A metrical foot of two stressed or long syllables is called
Question 39.Explanation: Trochee consists of one stressed syllable followed by an unstressed one; iamb has an unstressed syllable followed by a stressed one; while anapest consists of two unstressed syllable followed by a stressed one.

Question 40.Explanation: Trilogy is a group of three related poems, novels, films or play. An example of trilogy is Suzanne Collins’ Hunger Games, Catching Fire and Mocking Jay.

Question 49.Explanation: The omniscient point of view uses the third person narrative to narrate all that happens in the novel, including what goes on in the mind of the readers. It is an objective, all-knowing and all-present point of view.
